QuestData.Title: Stealth by Seaweed
QuestData.Description:
There! The disguise be complete!
Don't mind the smell, there. It's probably better that we smell like the kvaldir, as well. Though I have a feeling I'll be needin a priest to get this stench out once we're gone.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Kvaldir Disguise to sneak by Guarm.
QuestData.CompletionText: Gods, what is that stench?! $B$BThis disguise had better work!
QuestData.RewardText: That was a truly revolting, outsider. Even in death I've never witnessed such a disgusting smell.
